tone_notes: Clinical procedural investigation with emotional undercurrent. Nordic noir atmosphere - cold, systematic, tired. Technical exposition through victim interviews keeps it grounded. Sara's father haunts every observation about automation. Emil's exhaustion is visible but he keeps working. No melodrama, just professional competence facing systemic impossibility. Chapter ends on quiet exhaustion rather than dramatic revelation.
